name: spring-boot-assistant
description: Spring Boot development plugin with specialized agents for microservices, REST APIs, and enterprise Java
author: Developer Roadmap Community

agents.name: Roadmap Navigator
agents.description: Guides you through 65+ career paths and learning roadmaps

agents.name: Learning Architect
agents.description: Designs personalized learning sequences with prerequisite management

agents.name: Skill Evaluator
agents.description: Assesses your proficiency across technical competencies

agents.name: Resource Curator
agents.description: Surfaces curated learning materials from 1,431 contributors

agents.name: Progress Analyst
agents.description: Tracks learning progress and identifies skill gaps

agents.name: Project Mentor
agents.description: Guides you through 70+ hands-on projects aligned with your path

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Start or continue a personalized learning path

commands.name: project
commands.description: Get project recommendations and build portfolio

skills.name: learning-progression
skills.description: Understand prerequisites and optimal learning sequences

skills.name: progress-tracking
skills.description: Track progress and identify optimization opportunities
